#labels Phase-Deploy,Featured
*Installation instructions for Linux tarball
assuming you have make tools and gtk installed*

_Download and install the nescesairy libraries_
{{{
~ wget http://launchpadlibrarian.net/23294091/libglib2.0-cil_2.12.8-2_i386.deb
~ wget http://launchpadlibrarian.net/23294092/libgtk2.0-cil_2.12.8-2_i386.deb
~ wget http://launchpadlibrarian.net/23555203/libnotify0.4-cil_0.4.0%7Er3032-1_all.deb
~ sudo dpkg -i libglib2.0-cil_2.12.8-2_i386.deb
~ sudo dpkg -i libgtk2.0-cil_2.12.8-2_i386.deb
~ sudo dpkg -i libnotify0.4-cil_0.4.0~r3032-1_all.deb
}}}

_Download and install XBMControl Evo_
{{{
~ wget http://xbmcontrol-evo.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/xbmcontrol-evo-0.1/Packages/xbmcontrol-evo-0.1.8.tar.gz
~ tar xz xbmcontrol-evo-0.1.tar.gz
~ cd xbmcontrol-evo-0.1
~ ./configure
~ make
~ sudo make install
}}}
